title: 天皇賞（春）の後に・敗北後と次の夢

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Hah, hah, hah...
Ah. Still not good enough.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
...
I lost.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: I thought I'd gotten stronger with Tannhauser-san pushing me from behind, but...

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Rice-san!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: B, Bourbon-san!?

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
It was a wonderful race.
I wanted to tell you that.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
I'll be able to return soon.
So let's fight together again.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
...!
Yeah... yeah!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Hmm, it still wasn't enough.
This is where it starts.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Rice-san and McQueen were amazing.
Running with them gave me chills!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: The road ahead might still be long, but I'll do my best to win someday!

text_block_list.name: Interviewer A
text_block_list.text:
I see!
Thank you for the positive comment!

text_block_list.name: Interviewer A
text_block_list.text: By the way, have you decided on your next target race?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Well... I'm thinking I'd like to run on another big stage like this one next time.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: It might be a bit tough, but I'm hoping to run in the 'Takarazuka Kinen'!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: I'll do my best to win next time!
And so, it was decided: my next race will be the 'Takarazuka Kinen'.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Hoo...
The morning track is so quiet.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Hmm, the 'Takamatsunomiya Kinen' is 2200m on turf, right-handed, right? That means——
Haaah——!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Huh?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Hah, hah...! Not yet...!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: I must improve like Rice-san and Tannhauser-san too...!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: For the next 'Takamatsunomiya Kinen', I will definitely show you victory!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Amazing... McQueen isn't backing down...

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Mmm. Alright, I have to work hard too...!
The days of running hard toward the G1 medium race 'Takamatsunomiya Kinen' two months later began!
